Leland follows the story of Leland P. Spirit and Chaos is an artistic biopic of Miyazawa Kenji, a Japanese poet and writer who was active in the early 20th century. The movie centers around Miyazawa’s life beginning at age 9 and carries forward to his death during World War II at age 38. It’s structured in three parts, each following after successive stages of his life up to that point.
